name: Astral Witchery
description:
My very first game made in 2 weeks for My First Game Jam! Most of my game assets are all custom made by me and this took a lot out of me but I am proud I got it (mostly) done! 

A very (very) short and simple cute game about Mili, a young witch-in-training who still has a lot to learn. A simple exploring game where you can interact with objects!
